name: node-cubrid
description: This is a Node.js driver for CUBRID RDBMS. It is developed in 100% JavaScript and does not require specific platform compilation.
author: CUBRID <contact@cubrid.org> (http://www.cubrid.org/)

scripts.coverage: ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
